actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-117.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3464) to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to remove certain work disincentives for the disabled under the supplemental security income benefits program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3464 (Supplemental security income program).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3464) to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to remove certain work disincentives for the disabled under the supplemental security income benefits program, and for other purposes.
